cn.salesuite.saf.c2dm
类 C2DMBroadcastReceiver

java.lang.Object
  android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      cn.salesuite.saf.c2dm.C2DMBroadcastReceiver

public class C2DMBroadcastReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver

Helper class to handle BroadcastReciver behavior. - can only run for a limited amount of time - it must start a real service for longer activity - must get the power lock, must make sure it's released when all done.
